website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable, lightweight training mask that stays in place during vigorous workouts to improve endurance and stamina.
pros: Made with medical-grade silicone for a comfortable fit
Non-slip straps keep the mask from sliding even when you’re sweating
Provides 16 breathing levels to suit beginners and experts alike
One-size-fits-all design accommodates users between 120 and 230 pounds
Minimizes noise from breathing for ultra-silent performance
cons: The adjuster levers for changing resistance can be difficult to use
Levers can become loose over time too

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I purchased & have used this product. However, after further research I've learned that this product & similar breathing masks are a health risk & do not actually increase respiratory performance. Cardio masks do restrict oxygen intake yes, but its not the same as high altitude masks which can cost a couple thousand dollars. This mask & similar ones prevent your body from recieving neccessary oxygen to red blood cells while also poisoning you with more carbon dioxide intake. I'll be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mask, easy to put on and takeoff. It delivers its main task in 80% efficiency. What I didn't like about this mask is that during cardio exercises when I am exhaling aggressively, the mask does not fit perfectly and air finds its ways in and out without passing through the mask openings. Also, the package did not contain a leaflet to clarify the percentage of air it blocks or allows. But generally, it is working fine and I can feel the difference after using the mask. Please note that this mask is a no-joke during high intensity exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Amr

customer_reviews.title: TEC Mask- An Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to strengthen my lungs and accelerate my gains with my cardio. It was amazing how quickly I felt the gains from this product. It takes a few exercises to get used to it, but the first time I ran without it was amazing how much my endurance had increased. I was cleaning it after a workout and one of the air flow adjusters broke. Their customer service is outstanding because they sent me a new mask free of charge!
customer_reviews.author: ms.amazon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I was really apprehensive about buying a Training Mask because I have Pulmonary Emboli, but to my surprise I get great after Spinning on the bike. Taking slightly deep breaths and breathing in rhythm to the counts felt easy and comfortable. I still am not tired after a 2 hour and 15 minute workout. I am pretttttty impressed.
customer_reviews.author: ShopsAlot

customer_reviews.title: I feel like bane
customer_reviews.text: I feel like bane from batman walking into the gym, it's a conversation starter besides making you're workout more intense 🏃‍♂️🏃‍♂️💪💪💪 I feel incredibly wearing this
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: TOUGH...worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I underestimated how tough this mask is. Started off at level 1 and adjusted to the max...could not do it. I will get there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product to up your workout
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good build! Fits snugly around head & over face. Switches on the side help increase resistance, and there are extra resistors as well. It would be helpful if they had an altitude indicator to help you know what level you are working out at. Carrying pouch was nice as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Patrick Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid
customer_reviews.text: While looking for solutions to increase the output of my hiking training I found this. While I haven't been using it long it appears to be working. I won't get into the science or pseudoscience of using the device, only the device itself. It fits really well, seals to the face really well (and I have a beard), and is quickly disassembled for cleaning. If you'd like to try a training mask, this is a quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark from Dallas

customer_reviews.title: New level workout
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to breath but that is really the point def takes your workout to a whole new level
customer_reviews.author: voegy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't provide much resistance.
customer_reviews.text: This says it has 16 breathing levels, that is false advertising. It only has 4 (if you really want to give it a bone, they have 8, 4 settings for intake air and 4 for exhaust air -- I only consider this 4 settings). I didn't find that the resistance was very much. In theory, this works, but I would not buy again. In fact, I actually ended up returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: What a workout!
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while since I trained this hard. The levers are easy to adjust and the increase in levels are intense. I feel an increase in my endurance and stamina. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gifts for future mountain climbers.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my son and husband. They plan to climb Mount Kilimanjaro and are using these to train. I tried one and it definitely restricts air flow! Almost sent me into panic mode-lol!
customer_reviews.author: The DabblerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: No significant differences were found in pulmonary function
customer_reviews.text: No significant differences were found in pulmonary function or hematological variables. In fact, wearing this type of mask can cause pulmonary infection since the mask doesn’t let CO2 out. Work out smart, stay healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This mask looks really cool and sleek. It’s easy to use and clean. The adjustments for the settings are easy to use. This mask helps strengthen my breathing muscles. Like when you run and you start panting. It actually helps you not pant so hard once you get used to it. Great price too. Packaging was very nice too
customer_reviews.author: msilvestre

customer_reviews.title: This Really Works.
customer_reviews.text: I finally got a chance to use this apparatus distinctively to enhance my run time on the tread mill and after using it for 2weeks, I decided to time my 1 mile run time w/o it and I hit a 6 minute mile at 40yrs old. The mask works and is effective but has a tendency to slide off of my face when I perspire but I am fully satisfied w/my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judas C. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Very good trainer I gave a 4 because I didn't evaluate ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good trainer I gave a 4 because I didn't evaluate that a higher elevation training could mean my sensitive ears would pop on occasion lol. Great product, based on quality they really get a 5
customer_reviews.author: Pea money

customer_reviews.title: Not a healthy product
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t healthy for you, basically you are inhaled your own carbon dioxide and the valve not functioning as what the advertisement claimed. Unable to adjust the level and no matter what you select, it all act the same.
customer_reviews.author: Secret shopper

customer_reviews.title: worked out with this for a week and felt like I could run across the states and not get
customer_reviews.text: worked out with this for a week and felt like I could run across the states and not get tired
customer_reviews.author: King slayer

customer_reviews.title: Eh wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: It does what it’s supposed to do, but if you’re jumping roping or bouncing while running it slides down. The straps are thin and weak. Save your money. Elevation mask actually do nothing, after further research.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I'm a firefighter so my cardio is important ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I'm a firefighter so my cardio is important to me. Level 6 is the closest to being on air as you can be. Makes workouts that much more intense.
customer_reviews.author: Joey McCalla

customer_reviews.title: One flaw...
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and the product, very professional. The one flaw!! The right side lever, which is used to adjust/restrict the oxygen flow is loose. With that being said, I find that it takes several attempts to ensure that the right vent is equal to the left vent. I find it annoying when I am attempting to adjust vents when doing a HITT workout.
customer_reviews.author: kevyn monier

customer_reviews.title: Great looking mask, feels durable and looks good
customer_reviews.text: I dont write reviews but I feel that I have too because this mask is freaking awesome. I was in shock how it came packaged. It came in a nice looking box and then a carrying case along with it. I feel like the mask should cost more. Great mask, feels durable and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ish

customer_reviews.title: Breath taking
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This was a replacement for my Phantom Athletics mask (lost weight and the sleeve was to big and the company doesn’t sell just the sleeves and wanted me to buy another one in a smaller size). This one is much better than my previous mask
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-buy purchase. It'll have you breathing better in your normal life without it and that will reduce anxiety and over-all improve your life.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Nwajei

customer_reviews.title: Smelly plastic, moves on exhale, straps cant be adjusted much
customer_reviews.text: It smelled pretty volatile when taken out of the packaging, very strong plastic smell. Also every time you exhale (at least on my nose) the mask pushes off of your face. The neck strap Velcro has very limited range. Mine can’t get tight enough to keep the mask from coming off my face when I exhale. Also the filters seem to be pretty cheap. The thing functions relatively well but all it really has to do is limit the amount of air I’m taking in, so...
customer_reviews.author: steven westbrook

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good product. The concept here is to give your lungs a good workout just as you would your legs, arms, chest, etc. Pretty good invention!

customer_reviews.title: Damn good
customer_reviews.text: This mask fits my needs perfectly - different valve resistances. Easy to wear and use. Good price and product.

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile training aid
customer_reviews.text: I'd read about training masks, had seen people use them, and liked the concept. I think they're a worthwhile addition to my workout gear, helping me to breathe more deeply, efficiently, and purposefully. Very easy to use and seems well made, especially at the price point. Recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Great price Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fits great not.to big not to small and I love that you can adjust the breathing flow

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: i know what all the rage was about. elevation training is no joke!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it dosent work the with only 1 filter in and ...
customer_reviews.text: it dosent work the with only 1 filter in and i didnt notice till both filters were installed but changing the settings makes no differance in breathing difficulty

Amazing workouts with this product and a great lung capacity strengthening. The packaging was great and beautifully boxed. Although I wish redeeming you’re code on their website was easier, over all a great product.

customer_reviews.title: Challenging and shorter workouts
customer_reviews.text: Does the job as described. My workouts are more challenging and are more efficient. I just started using the Endurance Training Mask and feel my endurance improving during my runs.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was very dusty like smthey forgot about it in a shelf. The level setting mechanism was faulty and everything seems to be made from very cheap plastic except the strap. Pretty disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: good mask
customer_reviews.text: It is working good for what i need it for. fits well

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do limit your breathing

Everything so far though as the packaging, presentation and look of the product looks amazing. I was very impressed with the price of the TEC mask while seeing what the product was I received. Thank you TEC!

customer_reviews.title: Product seems great for the price (was given as a gift)

customer_reviews.title: Great for any athlete looking to build endurance
customer_reviews.text: Good for building lung capacity. Suggest gradual increases in resistance, even at level one , it’s difficult to run/jog... but after 15-20 mins... the body adjusts.

customer_reviews.title: Mask is a great fit. I'm about 230
customer_reviews.text: Mask is a great fit. I'm about 230, 20% BMI. Mask seems to be able to work efficiently. Definitely louder than expected. Sounds like I'm constantly chucking on a vape. Coworker told me he'll get use to it. Quite frankly I don't care if he does or doesn't.

customer_reviews.title: Will kick your ass

customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously hard, haven't even tried level 4 yet. A little hard to figure out at first but is definitely an AMAZING training tool.

customer_reviews.title: Really has made a difference in my training
customer_reviews.text: So simple and easy to use... has really helped me to advance my fitness. Great price and fantastic quality. What can I say... give it a try.

customer_reviews.title: Wow...THIS IS NO JOKE!!
customer_reviews.text: The Endurance Training Mask is no joke! I bought 2 - one for my girlfriend and one for myself. We did a HIIT workout together with our masks and it was so tough! We started at level 1 and moved up a couple levels during our workout. We loved the intensity! Will continue to use our masks to step up our training and build our endurance.

product_meta.title: TEC Training Mask - 16 Breathing Levels, Maximizes Workout and Achieves Benefit of High Altitude Elevation Training for Running, Cycling, Boxing, HIIT; Increases Cardio, Endurance and Stamina
product_meta.description:
If you want to Increase your Strength, Endurance, and Boost your Overall Performance, your Solution is Here...

Through TEC Innovation and Rigorous Testing, the Endurance Training Mask simulates high altitude hypoxic training which takes your workout to the Next Level.

Athletes, runners, cyclists, and gym enthusiasts have incorporated high altitude training in their regimen for decades because it increases lung capacity which boosts strength and endurance.

Don’t worry! TEC Endurance Training Mask comes with 16 easy-to-adjust breathing levels to accommodate all performance levels – simulating heights of 4,000 to 18,000 feet.

Comfortable, Ultra-Silent and Lightweight!

You don’t have to worry about selecting the right size. It’s anatomic design is intended to fit all men and women between 120lbs – 230lbs.

Regardless of how much you sweat, the non-slip straps will keep your training mask secured throughout your workout.

Also, it’s ultra-silent feature minimizes the noise from your breathing. Plus, it’s extremely lightweight and comes with a hard case so you can take it anywhere you want without damaging it.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee:

Our Endurance Training Mask is backed by our manufacturer 30-day money back guarantee.

So, what are you waiting for?

Click on the ‘ADD TO CART’ button and get your Endurance Training Mask shipped right away.
feature_bullets: INCREASES CARDIO AND ENDURANCE; takes your workout to the Next Level by adding resistance to your lungs; you are guaranteed an intense workout and a better run time!
HELPS CONTROL BREATHING with 16 adjustable levels this training device teaches you to focus on your breathing correctly which will increase your overall performance
UNLIKE OUR COMPETITORS our training mask includes 6 bonus valves which are easy to replace and work interchangeably; mimics various altitudes up to 18,000 ft
FEATURES NO WHISTLING NOISE, has a comfortable fit and does not slip off, super easy to use; One Size Fits most from 120lbs to 230 lbs
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED by our Top Ranked Customer Service Team; Click Add to Cart and Order Now
